html:
4.3.20  5:33 pm   what kind of question do you answer

     regular

4.3.20  5:22 pm   how's the composition process for your latest video going?

     totally wild, have to keep pausing to invent stuff

      also how are you in general?

     bad and good, but that's just a reflection of the planet i am living upon

4.3.20  4:39 pm   Worst and best species on earth 

     humans

4.3.20  4:38 pm   can you draw your favorite stick figure? 

     hm, working on it now

4.3.20  4:33 pm   how do you sleep

     try to get even more awake

4.3.20  4:32 pm   What are some good chords?

     F, C, G,

4.3.20  3:47 pm   You never said a proper goodbye in "might quit". Why?

     BECAUSE I'M NOT LEAVING

4.3.20  3:15 pm   Any computer programs you recommend off the top of your head? for anything really.

     keyboard maestro

4.3.20  2:56 pm   Do you drive a sports car

     no

4.3.20  2:50 pm   do you make the cover art before or after the music video?

     sometimes during, if i discover something that works well

4.3.20  2:49 pm   How do I make music that people will want to listen to?

     first you must make music that you want to listen to. but first, to do that, you must make music that you actually enjoy making

4.3.20  2:45 pm   on your song "i did a bad thing", what bad thing did you do?

     tried to crash the stock market but accidentally made it go really high instead

4.3.20  2:33 pm   how did you adopt your animating style

     just trying to get by

4.3.20  2:22 pm   I think some of ur catchiest songs are hallelujah and la de da de da de day oh. I really really think they are magnificent

What was ur inspiration for them 

     inspiration for 'hallelujah' was in general the repertoire for nigerian churches. the inspiration for 'la de da' was the pre-chorus of 'la de da', which understandibly wasn't called 'la de da' until the chorus occured

4.3.20  2:09 pm   Will u pls briefly explain to me what chords are

     sure. it's multiple notes at the exact same time

     Also the difference between a hook and a chorus

     doesn't really matter. they are both an attempt to say 'the important part of the song' but i think under further investigation it may not always be entirely clear which part is important

4.3.20  2:00 pm   whats the biggest problem that you had had in "building the machine"

     how ridiculous i need the machine to be

4.3.20  1:56 pm   is there a land of 3 letter words?

     yes, can you see now

4.3.20  1:33 pm   have you ever said a bad word?

     every word is bad

4.3.20  1:14 pm   Are you ever coming back or are you just turning over an entirely new leaf?

     oh extremely both

4.3.20  1:05 pm   Are you planning to take over the world?

     not necessary. the damn thing takes over itself

4.3.20  12:57 pm   what type of animations are you going to make in the future?

     nice

4.3.20  12:56 pm   Most of these days i become depressed but when i hear your song, i feel better after listening to your songs. Although i am not native English, but I always enjoy listening to your songs. thx billwurtz

     it's a plane it's a bird, it is friend ship

4.3.20  12:46 pm   do you spend everyday answering questions?

     only a small portion of the day

4.3.20  12:22 pm   Give me an idea

     how about going online

4.3.20  11:57 am   How much thought do you put into your lyrics?

     the thought only goes with feeling, and the lyrics only go with music. the music only goes with lyrics, and the feelings require thoughts also. as you can see, this 2x2 matrix has interdependence flowing through it. as for 'how much', always slam that dial to the max

      They seem so full of meaning and meaningless at the same time.

     ah, that reminds me of your question

4.3.20  11:42 am   why do you rarely play the snare on beats 2 and 4?

     sometimes there might be a better way to do things

4.3.20  11:07 am   mc donald or burger king

     i can't remember which is which

4.3.20  10:47 am   how pissed do you get when someone asks you about when the next video will come out?

have you ever considered purposefully postponing the upload date for each time someone asks you when the next video will come out?

     no, there is no date. i am hustling day and night to accomplish the 'impossible' as quickly as possible

     I also want to say that I really admire your style of creating videos. 

     that's nice of you

4.3.20  10:45 am   Do you every that people who society thinks they're weird think they are completely and entirely normal?

     yes

4.3.20  10:34 am   What are the songs or artists that inspired you?

     all of them

4.3.20  10:31 am   when is the end of the universe

     it is constantly ending and starting at the same time

4.3.20  10:22 am   Look like you are use blender on next video.

     not just

      Why?

     versatile, scriptable,

4.3.20  10:22 am   You, my friend are an absolute genius and I will share your content for years to come 

     oh that explains the weather report i saw where they said it was raining friendship

4.3.20  10:13 am   do you ever get sick of people asking if you get sick of people that ask you when a new video will come out?

     no, i already have a good answer for that which i will readily say again

4.3.20  10:06 am   Any advice on climbing mountains?

     see if you can stand where the mountain is going to be, before it's made. so then it will lift you up

4.3.20  9:58 am   Who's your fav Disney character 

     walt

4.3.20  9:46 am   Why is it that when faced with a question in real my brain breaks down but when someone asks me online I can think of every possible explanation 

     being in the presence of another person is a spectacularly overwhelming experience. it's very thrilling but it may take some getting used to

4.3.20  9:40 am   are you a musician?

     oh that would explain a lot

4.3.20  9:17 am   thoughts on adobe premiere pro

     no

4.3.20  9:12 am   You are in my top ten list of favourite humans :)
My favourite songs of yours are "might quit" and "La de da de da de day oh" :3
and my question is: if you had to have a spoonful of any condiment, which would you have? 

     oatmeal

4.3.20  8:21 am   4.2.20  2:57 pm ah so you finally learned how to delete the default cube or something

     not necessary. my default startup file has no cube

4.3.20  8:00 am   Hey Bill, just wonder if you will give up the current style edit in your videos (neon text, neon colors with poor drawings)

     i draw the best i can

     and start fresh after you done learning how to make videos.
Thank you for being original.
Good luck on your learning project about video making!

4.3.20  7:33 am   what's your opinion on highlighters?

     assuming each highlighter was colored on the outside by using another highlighter, i sometimes wonder how the first highlighter was made

4.3.20  7:27 am   I've seen you use caps before when someone asked you if you are mentally stable implying that you aren't mentally stable does that mean you hate upper case letters?

     no

     also can i see this message if you respond

     yes

4.3.20  6:50 am   You seem to have a great handle on being an "isolated" musician! Any advice for musicians that are used to in-person collaboration & now find themselves stuck on their own? 

     speak to a recording device, to help organize your mind

4.3.20  6:36 am   is there anybody who inspired you with their wisdom?

     yes

     would you share who that person is?

     i don't know all their names. it's everyone

4.3.20  6:35 am   i've encountered a problem with melody/lyrics
i can't seem to write lyrics i'm happy with without a good melody, but i also can't seem to get a good melody without lyrics i'm happy with. only very rarely do these two events combine, and not as often as i need them to, any helpful ideas?

     DO IT AT THE SAME TIME

4.3.20  6:27 am   how's self isolation workin out for ya

     pretty good. hard to believe it's been 11 and a half years already

4.3.20  5:44 am   You are freakin fascinating. Your dedication and style are unmatched and I hope you the best in all futre endeavors. But I must know what is the end goal? What is successs?

     starting something new

4.3.20  5:06 am   Bill, I respect your work so much. So I wanted to ask you something. I recently changed my work tools for some more professional ones. Even tho I learned how to used them perfectly I feel surpassed for the amount of new tools and options and I stopped working. What should I do?

     use simpler tools
